con:config.script:
import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse def subscriptionName = context.expand( '${GetSubscriptions#Response#$[0][\'SubscriptionName\']}' )
log.info(subscriptionName) if (subscriptionName == "" ||subscriptionName == null) testRunner.gotoStepByName("AddSubscription") else testRunner.gotoStepByName("ProcessTranslation")
